author: AP
title: Red Sox minor leaguer tests positive for virus, complex shut
description: Red Sox minor leaguer tests positive for virus, complex shut
content:
BOSTON (AP) — A minor league player for the Boston Red Sox has tested positive for the coronavirus, prompting the team to close down its training complex in Fort Myers, Florida.
The Red Sox made the announcement Tuesday, a day after the positive diagnosis. T… [+825 chars]
